tripleplay.ui.Style

  • Packages that use Style 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.ui  

    • Uses of Style in tripleplay.ui

      Subclasses of Style in tripleplay.ui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Style.Flag
      A Boolean style, with convenient members for on & off bindings.
      static class  Style.HAlignStyle
      Used to provide concise HAlign style declarations.
      static class  Style.PosStyle
      Used to provide concise Pos style declarations.
      static class  Style.TextEffectStyle
      Used to provide concise TextEffect style declarations.
      static class  Style.VAlignStyle
      Used to provide concise VAlign style declarations.
      Fields in tripleplay.ui declared as Style 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Style<Sound> Style.ACTION_SOUND
      The sound to be played when this element's action is triggered.
      static Style<Background> Style.BACKGROUND
      The background for an element.
      static Style<Background> Slider.BAR_BACKGROUND
      The background that renders the bar (defaults to a black rectangle).
      static Style<Integer> Scroller.BAR_COLOR
      The color of scroll bars.
      static Style<Float> Slider.BAR_HEIGHT
      The height of the bar.
      static Style<Scroller.BarRenderer> Scroller.BAR_RENDERER
      The renderer for scroll bars, by default a simple Surface.fillRect.
      static Style<Float> Scroller.BAR_SIZE
      The size of scroll bars.
      static Style<Float> Slider.BAR_WIDTH
      The width of the bar of an unstretched slider.
      static Style<Menu.AnimFn> Menu.CLOSER
      The closing animation function for the menu.
      static Style<Integer> Style.COLOR
      The foreground color for an element.
      static Style<Integer> Button.DEBOUNCE_DELAY
      A delay (in milliseconds) during which a button will remain unclickable after it has been clicked.
      static Style<Font> Style.FONT
      The font used to render text.
      static Style<Integer> Style.HIGHLIGHT
      The highlight color for an element.
      static Style<Tabs.Highlighter> Tabs.HIGHLIGHTER
      Style for highlighting a tab.
      static Style<IconEffect> Style.ICON_EFFECT
      The effect to apply to the icon.
      static Style<Integer> Style.ICON_GAP
      The gap between the icon and text in labels, buttons, etc.
      static Style<Integer> LongPressButton.LONG_PRESS_INTERVAL
      An interval (in milliseconds) after which pressing and holding on a button will be interpreted as a "long press" and fire a clicked event.
      static Style<Integer> Field.MAXIMUM_INPUT_LENGTH
      Sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered by this Field.
      static Style<Menu.AnimFn> Menu.OPENER
      The opening animation function for the menu.
      static Style<Canvas.LineCap> Style.OUTLINE_CAP
      The line cap for the outline, when using a vector outline.
      static Style<Canvas.LineJoin> Style.OUTLINE_JOIN
      The line join for the outline, when using a vector outline.
      static Style<Float> Style.OUTLINE_WIDTH
      The stroke width of the outline, when using a vector outline.
      static Style<String> Field.RETURN_KEY_LABEL
      Sets the label used on the "return" key of the virtual keyboard on native keyboards.
      static Style<Integer> Style.SHADOW
      The shadow color for an element.
      static Style<Float> Style.SHADOW_X
      The shadow offset in pixels.
      static Style<Float> Style.SHADOW_Y
      The shadow offset in pixels.
      Style<V> Style.Binding.style
      The style being configured.
      static Style<Keyboard.TextType> Field.TEXT_TYPE
      Sets the Keyboard.TextType in use by this Field.
      static Style<Image> Slider.THUMB_IMAGE
      The image to use for the slider thumb.
      static Style<pythagoras.f.IPoint> Slider.THUMB_ORIGIN
      The origin of the thumb image (used to center the thumb image over the tray).
